Chronology

  • Our passion

    At Best Way, we don’t just develop strategy games—we live and breathe them. Since 2000, our passion for deep, immersive gameplay has driven us to create genre-defining titles such as Soldiers: Heroes of World War II, Faces of War, and Men of War. With our proprietary Gem Engine, we push the boundaries of strategy gaming while empowering other creators to bring their visions to life. Every game we make is built on dedication, innovation, and a love for the craft. At Best Way, strategy isn’t just a genre—it’s our legacy.

Who We Are
At Best Way, strategy is more than just a genre—it’s the foundation of everything we do. Since 2000, we have been dedicated to pushing the boundaries of real-time strategy games, crafting immersive, intelligent experiences that stand the test of time.
From our groundbreaking debut with Soldiers: Heroes of World War II to the globally recognized Men of War series, our titles have consistently redefined what is possible in tactical gaming. With over two decades of innovation, we continue to build on our legacy, delivering games that blend depth, realism, and cutting-edge technology.
Technology That Empowers Developers
At the core of our success is the GEM Engine, our proprietary technology designed for deep tactical gameplay, advanced physics, and full-scale destructible environments.
More than just a tool for our own games, GEM Engine has been licensed by leading developers, including Ino-Co for Majesty 2 and various teams working on acclaimed titles like Battle of Empires: 1914-1918. We are committed to supporting third-party developers, providing them with the tools and expertise to bring their own strategic visions to life.
Beyond Development: A Publishing Partner
Best Way is more than just a development studio—we are a publishing partner for innovative strategy games. By leveraging our expertise in game design, technology, and distribution, we help bring ambitious projects to global audiences.
If you are an independent developer looking for a technology partner or an investor interested in proven, genre-defining titles, Best Way is your gateway to success in the strategy gaming market.
Shaping the Future of Strategy Games
As we look to the future, our mission remains clear:
  • To create bold, thought-provoking strategy games.
  • To provide cutting-edge technology to developers worldwide.
  • To support and publish the next generation of tactical experiences.
Let’s build the future of strategy gaming together. Contact us to learn more about GEM licensing, publishing opportunities, or investment partnerships.
